original_text: And Zacharias said unto the angel, Whereby shall I know this? for I am an old man, and my wife well stricken in years.
korean_text: 사가랴가 천사에게 이르되 내가 이것을 어떻게 알리요 내가 늙고 아내도 나이가 많으니이다

sentences.original_text: And Zacharias said unto the angel
for I am an old man
and my wife well stricken in years.
